title: Kite Flyer
description: Kite Flyer is an interactive web-based game where players control a kite flying through various environments. The game features realistic physics, dynamic weather conditions, and challenging obstacles. Players can customize their kites with different designs and colors, and compete for high scores on global leaderboards.
tech: Physics engine (e.g., Cannon.js) for realistic kite movement
Web Audio API for sound effects and music
Local Storage or IndexedDB for saving high scores and player progress
